     120             :  * underlying SQLite 3 database connection.
     121             :  *
     122             :  * Resource Acquisition Is Initialization (RAII) means that the Database Connection
     123             :  * is opened in the constructor and closed in the destructor, so that there is
     124             :  * no need to worry about memory management or the validity of the underlying SQLite Connection.
